meanings.definition: The act of making something tender.
meanings.sent1: After the tenderizations, the meat was soft and easy to chew.
meanings.sent2: The chef's tenderizations of the steak made it delicious.
meanings.sent3: The tenderizations of the cake batter made it fluffy and light.
meanings.sent4: Her gentle touch felt like tenderizations on my heart.
meanings.sent5: The tenderizations of the dough created a perfect texture for the bread.

meanings.definition: The process of breaking down tough fibers in meat to make it more tender.
meanings.sent1: The tenderizations of the meat made it juicy and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: Proper tenderizations can turn a tough cut of meat into a tender delight.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret to tender meat was his unique tenderizations technique.
meanings.sent4: The tenderizations of the steak were like a magic spell turning it into a delicacy.
meanings.sent5: The tenderizations of the chicken resulted in a mouthwatering dish.
